name: Meet Her There
description:
Meet Her There is a short, intense, emotional time-loop, in which you're stuck reliving the same day over and over, trying to reach a person you love. It is an ultra-stylized visual novel, made entirely in 2 colors.

Originally a statement on time-loop narratives, it went on to become something a bit more ambitious, although it is still a very small-scale, intimate project.

Made By: Sinisthesis

Developed and published by me. Hi, I'm H_AK. I created the entirety of the story, assets and music in this game.

Genre: Interactive Narrative, Visual Novel

While I wouldn't call it a proper visual novel myself, it is built using a modified RenPy engine, so it should be a familiar gameplay experience to everyone who has experience with visual novels.

Content Warning: suicidal themes, foul language.

This is a very intense story with a very dark theme underneath, but I believe that these types of stories are important to explore. There's no graphic violence and I tried to approach the topics with an appropriate level of responsibility, but at the end of the day this is a pretty heavy game so I hope that you're approaching it knowing that its contents might be emotionally upsetting. It is also entirely a work of fiction, and any semblance to existing people, living or dead, is purely coincidental.

Reviews:

Meet Her There received some great responses from the people who have played its development builds so far. Here's a couple of quotes from the responses I've received:


- love the art, the sound design, and the dialogue was very well done

- short but pretty compelling. The visual style perfectly suited the dark subject matter

- great writing and story telling


I hope that you like it as well.
Cheers, H_AK.
